Statute.Title: British Columbia Grain Handling Operations Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Manutention des grains en Colombie-Britannique, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Human Resources Development (SI/93‑142 and 1996, c. 11, s. 96)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1991, c. 25 (assent: 14.06.91), except Part II (ss. 14 to 24), in force 15.06.91, but not before the twelfth hour after the time at which it is assented to see ss. 25(1); Part II (ss. 14 to 24) in force 17.12.91 see SI/92‑3
